select * from (select rownum as rnum, a.* from
(select student.stu_idx, student.stu_id, student.stu_name, student.stu_tel, student.stu_email, student.stu_in_date, student.stu_out_date, student.stu_school, LISTAGG(class.class_subject, '|') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY class.class_idx) as class_subject, LISTAGG(class.class_idx, '|') WITHIN GROUP(ORDER BY class.class_idx) as class_idx_s from student, class, class_student where class_student.stu_idx(+) = student.stu_idx and class_student.class_idx = class.class_idx(+) group by student.stu_idx, student.stu_id, student.stu_name, student.stu_tel, student.stu_email, student.stu_in_date, student.stu_out_date, student.stu_school order by student.stu_idx asc )a )b where rnum>=#{startNum} and rnum<=#{endNum}
